title: Superproxy
description: Superproxy is an AI-powered CRM that offers salesperson a Conversational AI that does their calls.
longDescription: Superproxy is an AI-powered CRM that offers salesperson a Conversational AI that does their calls. It enables sales representatives to offload routine quotation discussions and customer interactions by summarizing quotes, surfacing updates, conducting client calls with a voice agent, and automatically capturing full conversation transcripts—reducing manual effort and allowing reps to focus on high-value closing activities.

title: Thryve
description: A Dating Site with gender-based matching, realtime messaging, and video calls.
longDescription: Thryve is a dating site that allows users to find matches based on their gender and interests. It has features like gender-based matching, like profiles, realtime messaging, and video calls.

title: HueFit
description: An E-commerce App with Skin-Tone Based Outfit Recommendation System and Virtual Fitting Technology.
longDescription: HueFit consist of web and mobile platform, where the web-based platform handles inventory and order management and mobile-based platform handles the e-commerce platform with ai-powered outfit recommendation and virtual fitting technology.

title: PasaBuy
description: A Mobile Community Delivery App that connects users with individuals who can help purchase and bring specific products home.
longDescription: PasaBuy is an Android mobile app inspired by the Filipino concept of "PasaBuy." It's a community-driven delivery platform that connects users with individuals—often from abroad or different areas—who can help purchase and bring specific products home.

title: SmileCare
description: A Web-based Appointment System for a local dental clinic.
longDescription: Donna Mae Jorge-Hollman Dental Clinic is web-based appointment scheduling for a local dental clinic. Patients are able to select appointment schedules that are created by the assistant doctor.

title: OnlyFunds
description: A Mock-up Desktop Banking System App that mimics a real banking system.
longDescription: OnlyFunds is a mock-up desktop banking system built using C# Windows Form. This project was made in my second year college in subject - Object Oriented Programming.

title: AniQuinch
description: A Mock-up E-commerce Website that mimics a real e-commerce website.
longDescription: AniQuinch is an anime merchandise store simulating how an e-commerce look only using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project was made in my first year college in subject - Computer Fundamental.
